title: Authors and Citation

what: Data from the World Checklist of Vascular Plants
title: Data from the World Checklist of Vascular Plants
text: rWCVPdata data package redistributes snapshots World Checklist Vascular Plants (WCVP) database easier load R.

title: Data from the World Checklist of Vascular Plants
text: rWCVPdata hosted CRAN, can install using: can add data repository repo list first: can install latest development version rWCVPdata GitHub :
code: install.packages("rWCVPdata", repos=c("https://matildabrown.github.io/drat", "https://cloud.r-project.org")) r <- getOption("repos") r["matildabrown"] <- "https://matildabrown.github.io/drat" options(repos=r)  install.packages("rWCVPdata") # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("matildabrown/rWCVPdata")

title: Data from the World Checklist of Vascular Plants
text: use rWCVPdata, please cite snapshot database used paper describing WCVP. can find cite running:

text: dataset containing distribution data WCVP, mapped Biodiversity Information Standards (TDWG) World Geographical Scheme Recording Plant Distributions (WGSRPD)

title: The World Checklist of Vascular Plants: distributions — wcvp_distributions
The World Checklist of Vascular Plants: distributions — wcvp_distributions
text: data frame 1,950,339 rows 11 variables: plant_locality_id Sequential number. plant_name_id World Checklist Vascular Plants (WCVP) identifier continent_code_l1 WGSRPD Level 1 code. continent WGSRPD Level 1 name. region_code_l2 WGSRPD Level 2 code. region WGSRPD Level 2 name area_code_l3 WGSRPD Level 3 code area WGSRPD name introduced 0 native; 1 introduced extinct 1 extinct; 0 extant location_doubtful 1 doubtful; 0 otherwise

title: The World Checklist of Vascular Plants: distributions — wcvp_distributions

what: The World Checklist of Vascular Plants: names — wcvp_names
title: The World Checklist of Vascular Plants: names — wcvp_names
text: dataset containing taxonomic data WCVP.

title: The World Checklist of Vascular Plants: names — wcvp_names
The World Checklist of Vascular Plants: names — wcvp_names
text: data frame 1,415,007 rows 31 variables: plant_name_id World Checklist Vascular Plants (WCVP) identifier ipni_id International Plant Name Index (IPNI) identifier. Missing values indicate name matched name IPNI. taxon_rank level taxonomic hierarchy taxon nname fits. infraspecific names unranked value iin column. taxon_status Indication taxonomic opinion re name. family name family taxon belongs. (highest rank names presented WCVP). genus_hybrid Indication hybrid status genus level: \+ indicates graft-chimaera × indicates hybrid. genus name genus record refers. species_hybrid Indication hybrid status species level: \+ indicates graft-chimaera × indicates hybrid. species species epithet combined genus name make binomial name species. Empty taxon name rank genus. infraspecific_rank taxonomic rank infraspecific epithet. Empty taxon name species rank higher. information, see International Code Nomenclature algae, fungi plants: https://www.iapt-taxon.org/nomen/main.php infraspecies infraspecific epithet combined binomial make trinomial name infraspecific rank. Empty taxon name species rank higher. parenthetical_author author authors responsible publication original scientific name. Empty name change occurred. primary_author author authors responsible publication scientific name. Missing values indicate instances authorship unknown non-applicable (e.g. autonyms). publication_author author authors publication scientific name first published (may different primary author e.g. described book). Missing values indicate instances publication details unknown non-applicable (e.g. autonyms). place_of_publication journal, bulletin publication taxon name first published . Missing values indicate instances publication details unknown non-applicable (e.g. autonyms). volume_and_page volume page numbers original publication taxon name, "5(6): 36" volume 5, issue 6, page 36. Missing values indicate instances publication details unknown non-applicable (e.g. autonyms). first_published year publication taxon name, enclosed parentheses. Missing values indicate instances publication details unknown non-applicable (e.g. autonyms). nomenclatural_remarks Remarks nomenclature. geographic_area geographic distribution taxon (names species rank ): generalised statement narrative form. lifeform_description lifeform (lifeforms) taxon. Terms refer modified verison Raunkiær system. multiple lifeforms, common listed first. Missing values unknown. climate_description Habitat type taxon, derived published habitat information. taxon_name Concatenation genus species , applicable, infraspecific epithets make binomial trinomial name. taxon_authors Concatenation parenthetical primary authors. Missing values indicate instances authorship unknown non-applicable (e.g. autonyms). accepted_plant_name_id ID accepted name taxon. taxon_status "Accepted", identical plant_name_id value. May empty taxon status unplaced, ilegitimate, cases accepted name vascular plant (e.g. moss, alga animal). basionym_plant_name_id ID original name taxon_name derived (.e. basionym). Empty name changes. replaced_synonym_author author authors responsible publication replaced synonym. Empty name replacement name based another name. homotypic_synonym synonym type - TRUE homotypic synonym, otherwise NA. parent_plant_name_id ID parent genus parent species accepted species infraspecific name. Empty non accepted names parent yet calculated. powo_id Identifier required look name directly Plants World Online (POWO). hybrid_formula Parents hybrid. reviewed Flag indicating whether family taxon belongs peer reviewed.
